verses.name: 1 Kings 9:1
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Solomon had finished the building of the house of the Lord, and the king’s house, and all Solomon’s desire which he was pleased to do,

verses.name: 1 Kings 9:2
verses.text: That the Lord appeared to Solomon the second time, as he had appeared unto him at Gibeon.

verses.name: 1 Kings 9:3
verses.text: And the Lord said unto him, I have heard thy prayer and thy supplication, that thou hast made before me: I have hallowed this house, which thou hast built, to put my name there for ever; and mine eyes and mine heart shall be there perpetually.
